```{r}
folder_in <- "mdFiles"

folder_out <- "."


for(FF in list.files(folder_in)) if(FF == "SPLASH_followup_review.md") {
  cat("\n\nProcessing",  F,  "\n")
  rmarkdown::render(file.path(folder_in, FF, fsep = '/'),
  output_format = rmarkdown::html_document(toc=T, toc_depth=2),
    output_file=paste0(sub(".md$", '', FF), '.html'),
    output_dir = '.',
    output_yaml = '_site.yml')
    ####params=list(css='$css_file'))
}

```
